title: Singed needs more outplay potential.
body:
At this point, singed just has to use ghost and turn on his poison, then catch up to you and throw you behind him. There's no outplay to it. The throwback range is much larger than flash, making flash useless against it, and since you're definitely gonna be slowed, heals movement burst isn't very useful either. 
I have an idea to put a stop to this BS. Instead of throwing an enemy far back, make them go directly behind him, so they actually have a shot at escaping.
This should definitely fix him. Thoughts?

replies.body:
CC him before he gets into throw range, then run.

Slows work too, Ghost doesn't give slow resist.

Apply any CC to him and done, he has been counter played. If he can't get to you then he is useless.

If singed is played top pick champions with slows. I recommend {{champion:150}} and {{champion:68}} .
As much as I hate Singed with a passion that he made me rage and break my IPhone 5, He has outplay potential IMO, You just need more experience.

He's a juggernaut. 
Apply basic Juggernaut counter play measures.

so... what are you supposed to do when singed catches you regardless... then uses his slow on top of himself and you're garunteed to be rooted?


Not knocking your idea, just wondering how this works.

> [{quoted}](name=RÃ²ssy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=REhgWJE9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-29T00:33:34.855+0000)
>
> so... what are you supposed to do when singed catches you regardless... then uses his slow on top of himself and you're garunteed to be rooted?
> 
> 
> Not knocking your idea, just wondering how this works.

Remove the entire root concept from his slow circle completely.
